name: Finlayball
description:
My first pico-8 game. Clear the screen as fast as you can!

Scoring brackets:

  • 3000-∞: Non-gamer
  • 2000-2999: You need practice
  • 1000-1999: Doing OK
  • 500-999: Respectable
  • 100-499: Good
  • 0-99: Thank RNGesus

Secret modes from title screen:

  • Press Z for MIDAS MODE
  • Press X for PAINT MODE
